csvUrl.title: CSV URL (https://...)
csvUrl.description: Public URL to the CSV. Leave blank if using Key-Value Store.

useKvInput.title: Use Key-Value Store 'INPUT.csv'
useKvInput.description: Enable this if you upload a file named INPUT.csv into the actor run's Key-Value Store.

urlCol.title: URL Column Name
urlCol.description: The exact column name in your CSV that contains the URLs to be scraped.

waitMs.title: Page Load Timeout (ms)
waitMs.description: Time to wait for page load before timing out.

limit.title: Max Rows to Process (0 = all)
limit.description: Set to limit the number of CSV rows to process. Leaves rest untouched.

force.title: Overwrite existing 'Found Emails' values
force.description: Enable to re-scrape rows that already have values.
